"Sleepless" is a song by the band King Crimson from their 1984 album Three of a Perfect Pair. The song was released as a single in March 1984 and mixed for radio by Bob Clearmountain. The track is best known for its  opening bass-line which features Tony Levin slapping on the strings to create a pulsating beat, and for the music video in which all four members of the band appeared.

Uses in Popular Culture
A remixed version has been used as the interlude music for the long-running Australian Broadcasting Commission music video program [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Rage_(TV_program)&oldid=1300253393 Rage]. The accompanying video clip features excerpts from the original music video for the song.
